title: Note – The Proforma is for an illustrative guidelineonly
clause_text: Note – The Proforma is for an illustrative guidelineonly. Theproforma may be modified to suit the provisions of DCR under which the development is proposed. Stamp of date of receipt of plans Stamp of approval of plans
